html:
this tombstone clearly says
paranoid schizophrenia
it's a dead body already
he died before his heart stopped
he was killed earlier
there was no place for him
it's a dead body already
let him bite the dust
he said he's among stars
that he chases light
that he recieved a postcard
from Eden itself
we killed him!
there was no place for him
let him rot now
it's a product of our health
title: Paranoid
